overview: Allan Howard was born in Queens, NY. At the age of 11, he was introduced to programming in BASIC, he was in love from the first GOTO: statement. After completing his Bachelor’s of Science as a computer science major he worked as a software consultant in the financial and eCommerce industries. In 2010, Allan co-founded cubTales.com, a social network application focused on providing parents a intimate environment to store and share their child’s special moments. As Chief Technical Officer of cubTales, Allan is solely responsible for the design and implementation of the backend services and systems. Allan also enjoys the arts, and firmly believes that “The Matrix” is one of the greatest movies of all time.
